channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump makes probationary periods tougher for new federal workers
item.description: President Trump on Thursday ordered a new set of performance evaluations for federal workers during the probationary period of their employment.

item.title: Ex-GOP congressman George Santos faces up to 87 months in prison in federal fraud case
item.description: Ousted former GOP Rep. George Santos faces up to 87 months in prison in his federal case after pleading guilty to federal fraud and identity theft cha...

item.title: Trump says China's Xi called him amid ongoing confusion over trade talks
item.description: President Donald Trump has said that Chinese President Xi Jinping has called him but did not say if any of those communications took place since he im...

item.title: The Nonprofit Hijacking America’s 250th Birthday Celebration Is The 1619 Project On Steroids
item.description: Leftist organizers see America’s 250th anniversary as a major cultural battlefield to push political agendas instead of celebrations.

item.title: Bond Markets Are Flashing Red, and Congress Must Heed the Warning
item.description: The smoke alarm is going off. Washington’s next move will determine whether it becomes a fire drill or a four-alarm blaze.

item.title: RFK’s Controversial Description Of Autism Is Exactly Why The Spectrum Needs To Be Broken Up
item.description: The autism spectrum is so broad that the term 'autistic' no longer paints a discrete picture of what’s being described.

item.title: Infamous late-term abortionist who wrote about 'dismembering' babies closes Colorado clinic

item.title: Stacey Abrams considers 3rd run for Georgia governor despite back-to-back defeats
item.description: Stacey Abrams, a former Democratic Party leader in the Georgia state legislature and a nationally known voting-rights champion, is seriously consideri...

item.title: Trump targets ActBlue for investigation of straw donors
item.description: President Trump is targeting ActBlue, the major online donation platform used by Democrats, by cracking down on "straw donors" or foreign campaign con...

item.title: NYT Wants You To Feel Very Sorry For This Drug-Dealing Kidnapper Trump Deported
item.description: He made bad choices and is owed no sympathy. He owes the U.S. thanks for the opportunities he was given even after conviction.

item.title: Durbin says elderly lawmakers should consider leaving politics 'before they're carried out'
item.description: Illinois Sen. Richard Durbin, a Democrat, said Thursday that older lawmakers may want to consider when it is time to step away from politics for the y...

item.title: The Week: Pope Francis’s Death, and His Successor’s Challenges
item.description: Plus: Harvard files suit over an executive order cutting off its federal funding.

item.title: Slashing NASA’s Budget Will Get Us to Mars Faster
item.description: By redirecting efforts toward what works, the Trump administration is well-positioned to ensure the first boots on Mars are American.

item.title: Judge Strikes Down Illinois Law Requiring Pro-Life Doctors To Promote Abortion
item.description: A judge struck down Illinois' abortion promotion mandate as a violation of the First Amendment in a resounding victory for free speech.

item.title: Trump Shifts His Own Vibe
item.description: What he’s been disrupting lately is his own presidency.

item.title: ICE says illegal immigrants have 'no less than 12 hours' to challenge Alien Enemies deportations
item.description: U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement says it gives illegal immigrants it wants to deport under President Trump's expedited removal powers at least...

item.title: Did the Pandemic Weaken the Taboo Against Antisemitism?
item.description: The definitions of what’s crazy, what’s malicious, what’s polite, normal, and respectable all lost some of their force.

item.title: Gun Control Doesn’t Stop Shootings Outside The United States, So It Won’t Here Either
item.description: Targeted attacks on schools are not uniquely American. They are global phenomena driven by evil, not geography or firearms laws.

item.title: Trump paves the way for deep-sea mining
item.description: President Trump is making moves for the United States to obtain the minerals in the seafloor, an offshore mining operation that some countries have ba...

item.title: Florida Senate's Democratic leader says the state party is dead and he's leaving it
item.description: The top Democrat in Florida's Senate is leaving his party, declaring that "the Democratic Party in Florida is dead."
